text:
I will strongly recommend Dr Riley Lana Archer in Kinex mall at Tanjong Katong. I am very happy with the care and patience shown throughout my whole experience. Highly meticulous and great quality of work. Very reassuring by giving clear and detailed explanation. Staffs were cheerful, friendly and helpful too.

😊😊😊👍👍👍

Top notch dentistry and services rendered by assistant.
Zero respect for patients time... never again.

*update*
Q&M has since followed up on this matter professionally and I am fully satisfied with their explanation and response. Appreciate their patience in dealing with me.
In retrospect, i guess i should have tried to understand the true cause for that event taking place before passing judgement.
Thanks!

I would like to say a big thank you to Dr Amit Patel for his services relating to braces and veneers. He made the whole process very smooth and was super helpful in scheduling last-minute appointments when needed. I'm very pleased with the final outcome and am very grateful to him! The supporting team at Q&M is very warm and helpful too. I strongly recommend Dr Amit and his team! :)

Attentive service from Shan and Wendy! They really helped to calm the nerve before the wisdom tooth surgery! And the merticulous procedure carried out by Dr Kenneth Lee! They weren’t any swelling at all after the surgery! Thank you to all the staff from the Katong clinic!

I had an exceptional experience at Dr. Kenneth's dental clinic, thanks to his outstanding care and expertise. During my visit, I was particularly impressed by Dr. Kenneth's thoroughness in explaining each step of the procedure, which greatly alleviated my anxiety. His compassionate approach made me feel at ease throughout the entire process.

Nurse Shan was an absolute gem! She could tell I was a bit anxious, especially since it was my first time getting an injection. She gave me reassuring pats on my shoulders and hands, which really helped calm my nerves.

Giving Dr. Kenneth and Nurse Shan two thumbs up for their exceptional care and kindness. They made what could have been a stressful experience into a breeze ♥️🦷
